items.title: Why Signal’s post-quantum makeover is an amazing engineering achievement
bullets: • The encryption protecting communications against criminal and nation-state snooping is under threat
• As private industry and governments get closer to building useful quantum computers, the algorithms protecting Bitcoin wallets, encrypted web visits will be useless
• Less than half of all TLS connections made inside Cloudflare network and only 18 percent of Fortune 500 networks support quantum-resistant encryption

• If 4chan continues to ignore Ofcom, the forum could be blocked in the UK

items.title: Popular hair-loss pill linked to depression and suicide
bullets: • Finasteride, a common hair-loss drug, has long been tied to depression and suicide, but regulators ignored the warnings

• Author calls for urgent regulatory reforms and post-marketing studies to protect public health

items.title: Microplastics are brought into the wilderness on hiking shoes and gear, study shows
bullets: • Researchers measured microplastic levels in two lakes that are the among highest sources of water for the Hudson River
• Microplastics are tiny bits of plastic either intentionally added to consumer goods, or products of larger plastics breaking down
• The particles may contain any number of 16,000 plastic chemicals, of which many, such as BPA, phthalates and Pfas, present serious health risks

items.title: Your skin could warn of hidden mental health trouble
bullets: • People with skin conditions who also have skin conditions are at greater risk of depression and suicidal thoughts, according to new research presented at the ECNP meeting in Amsterdam
• Scientists found that 25% of these patients experienced suicidal ideation, compared with only 7% of those without skin issues
• Dermatological symptoms could serve as early warning markers for worse psychiatric outcomes

items.title: This experimental “super vaccine” stopped cancer cold in the lab
bullets: • Researchers at the University of Massachusetts Amherst have shown that their nanoparticle-based vaccine can successfully prevent several aggressive cancers in mice
• The vaccine triggers a multi-pathway immune response, producing powerful T-cell activation and long-term immune memory that stops both tumor growth and metastasis
• Depending on the cancer type, up to 88% of vaccinated mice stayed tumor-free

items.title: Decades-old photosynthesis mystery finally solved
bullets: • Scientists from the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) and Caltech have finally solved a decades-old mystery about how photosynthesis really begins
• They discovered why energy inside plants flows down only one of two possible routes — a design that lets nature move sunlight with astonishing precision
• The findings were published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
